metadata.name: Metropolis - The Girl with the Golden Helmet
metadata.description:
This design (detail) is inspired by a film poster of the Universum-Film Aktiengesellschaft (Ufa, Germany) from the year 1926. The original poster design is archived as physical item at the Austrian National Library (Vienna) and also online accessible under Metropolis by Werner Graul.

Years ago I had the pleasure to work with this historical material to create a print product.

Credits:  
The golden helmet (unchanged) taken from a 3D-Artists portfolio: 'Elven Helmet for games' by Mads.Stenberg is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution.
